Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to the Circus and Paul Bunyan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Paul Bunyan and the setting of a circus, showcasing his performance and the town's reaction to the circus's arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Performance
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces Paul Bunyan as a circus performer, highlighting his strength and showmanship.

sub_scenes.title: Town's Excitement for the Circus
sub_scenes.description: The townspeople react with excitement to the circus's arrival, anticipating the spectacle.

sub_scenes.title: Observing the Circus Animals
sub_scenes.description: The scene shifts to the circus grounds where people are marveling at the exotic animals, particularly a giraffe.

Major_Arcs.title: Mystery and Confrontation in the Circus Tent
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a mystery unfolding inside a circus tent, escalating into a confrontation and fight involving the 'strongest man'.

sub_scenes.title: Investigating Sounds of Trouble
sub_scenes.description: Two men hear suspicious sounds from a tent and decide to investigate.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with 'Billings'
sub_scenes.description: Inside the tent, a man named 'Billings' is confronted and threatened, but another man intervenes, identifying him.

sub_scenes.title: Strongman's Retaliation
sub_scenes.description: The 'strongest man' reacts to the threats with force, attacking his aggressors.

sub_scenes.title: Escalation with a Pistol
sub_scenes.description: The conflict escalates as a new man appears with a pistol, posing a deadly threat.

sub_scenes.title: Strongman's Defiance to Pistol Threat
sub_scenes.description: Despite the pistol threat, the 'strongest man' defiantly declares retaliation.

sub_scenes.title: Gunshot and Injury
sub_scenes.description: The confrontation culminates in a gunshot, injuring the 'strongest man'.

Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Owner and Recruitment of Paul Bunyan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the circus owner and the backstory of Matto Grasso, leading to the recruitment of the strong man as Paul Bunyan.

sub_scenes.title: Strongman's Toss and Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: A strong man throws a man in a suit and initiates a conversation.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Owner's Grasso Backstory
sub_scenes.description: The man in the suit reveals himself as the circus owner and explains his conflict with Matto Grasso.

sub_scenes.title: Recruitment of Paul Bunyan
sub_scenes.description: The circus owner recruits the strong man to replace Grasso, naming him Paul Bunyan.

Major_Arcs.title: Grasso's Revenge and Paul Bunyan's Heroism
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Matto Grasso's vengeful plots against Paul Bunyan and Paul's heroic responses to sabotage attempts at the circus.

sub_scenes.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan is celebrated as the new strongman, while Matto Grasso watches with envy and plots revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Kerosene Plot
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso prepares kerosene to set fire to the circus tent as an act of revenge.

sub_scenes.title: Tent Fire and Bunyan's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A fire breaks out in the circus tent, but Paul Bunyan quickly extinguishes it, saving the day.

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Frustration and New Plan - Gigantico
sub_scenes.description: Frustrated by his failed fire plot, Grasso immediately devises a new plan involving releasing a large ape, Gigantico.

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico's Escape and Paul's Control
sub_scenes.description: Gigantico is released, causing alarm, but Paul Bunyan swiftly intervenes to regain control.

Major_Arcs.title: The Chase and Capture of Grasso
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the chase and eventual capture of Matto Grasso by Paul Bunyan after Grasso's sabotage attempts.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase Begins
sub_scenes.description: Grasso flees, and Paul Bunyan starts chasing him, initiating a pursuit.

sub_scenes.title: Entering the Arena and New Plan
sub_scenes.description: Grasso runs into the arena, and someone plans to intervene in the chase.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Arena and New Plan

sub_scenes.title: Weight Toss Attempt
sub_scenes.description: Grasso attempts to use a weight to stop Paul Bunyan but fails.

sub_scenes.title: Bucket Trick and Continued Escape
sub_scenes.description: Grasso tries another trick with a bucket but continues to flee.

narrative_arcs.title: Bucket as a Trick and Continued Escape

Major_Arcs.title: Capture of Grasso and Bunyan's Farewell
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Grasso storyline with his capture by Paul Bunyan and Paul's decision to leave the circus.

sub_scenes.title: Turn to Fight and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan turns the chase into a physical confrontation and captures Grasso.

narrative_arcs.title: The Turn to Fight and Capture

sub_scenes.title: Unconventional Show and Threat
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan lifts Grasso and threatens to throw him onto a trapeze, creating a spectacle.

sub_scenes.title: Trapeze Toss and Audience Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Paul throws Grasso onto a trapeze bar, and the audience reacts to the dramatic event.

narrative_arcs.title: The Trapeze Toss and Audience Reaction

sub_scenes.title: Praise and Orders for Capture
sub_scenes.description: An authority figure praises Paul and orders officers to capture Grasso.

sub_scenes.title: Job Offer and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Paul is offered a permanent job but declines, preferring to return to the woods.

sub_scenes.title: Departure and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan says farewell and departs, returning to the North Woods.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Severed Head
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Marco Polo and a bizarre encounter with a talking severed head in a forest.

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo's Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Marco Polo and a mysterious encounter related to the 'Awful Ogress of Tibet'.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Encounter with the Ogress

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: A man on horseback discovers a severed human head in a forest.

sub_scenes.title: The Talking Severed Head's Plea
sub_scenes.description: The severed head comes to life and pleads for help from the man.

Major_Arcs.title: The Magic Dagger and the Mourning City
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a magic dagger and leads the man on horseback to a city in mourning.

sub_scenes.title: Sacred Dagger and Debt Repayment
sub_scenes.description: The man on horseback saves a tied man who offers a magic dagger as thanks.

narrative_arcs.title: The Sacred Dagger and Debt Repayment

sub_scenes.title: Question of Knife's Inaction and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: The man questions the dagger's non-use, and the tied man explains before departing for Hi-toun.

narrative_arcs.title: The Question of the Knife's Inaction and Farewell

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Mourning City
sub_scenes.description: The man on horseback arrives at a city initially mistaken for festive but is actually in mourning.

Major_Arcs.title: Princess Lotus and the Ogress's Castle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's arrival in Hi-toun, his offer to help find Princess Lotus, and his encounter with a woman who leads him to a witch's castle.

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo's Royal Welcome
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo arrives in Hi-toun and is welcomed by the King.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Arrival and Royal Welcome
The King's Grief and Princess Lotus's Disappearance

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo Offers Assistance
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo offers to help find the missing Princess Lotus.

sub_scenes.title: Plea from a Starving Woman
sub_scenes.description: A cloaked woman interrupts, pleading for help for her starving children.

narrative_arcs.title: A Plea from a Starving Woman

sub_scenes.title: Journey to the Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo agrees to help and rides with the woman towards her ominous 'witch's castle' home.

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation with the Ogress
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's encounter and confrontation with the Ogress in her castle.

sub_scenes.title: Entering Mysterious Castle and Strange Children
sub_scenes.description: Marco and the woman enter the castle, where she introduces mice as her 'children'.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Strange Children

sub_scenes.title: Ogress Transformation
sub_scenes.description: The woman reveals her true form as an Ogress when Marco tries to leave.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Sword Drawn
sub_scenes.description: The Ogress unleashes monstrous mice, and Marco draws his sword, preparing to fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Monstrous Mice and Sword Drawn

sub_scenes.title: Initial Attack and Evasion Attempt
sub_scenes.description: A cloaked figure attacks a man (Marco Polo) with magical fire, and he tries to escape.

sub_scenes.title: Snake Entrapment and Capture
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked figure uses magical snakes to capture the man.

sub_scenes.title: Further Restraint and Mocking Dialogue
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked figure further restrains and mocks the captured man.

Major_Arcs.title: Defeat of the Ogress and Reunion with the Father
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the defeat of the Ogress using the magic knife, the escape of the captives, and the reunion with Princess Lotus's father.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity and Ogre's Threat
sub_scenes.description: The Ogress gloats over her captives, revealing her intention to eat them.

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of the Special Knife and Hope
sub_scenes.description: The man remembers the magic knife, offering a chance of escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Special Knife and Hope

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Downfall
sub_scenes.description: The Ogress is defeated by the magic knife.

sub_scenes.title: Escape from the Dungeon with the Magic Knife
sub_scenes.description: The man and woman escape using the magic knife.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape from the Dungeon with the Magic Knife

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and the Misunderstanding of Black Drapes
sub_scenes.description: They arrive at the city and encounter a cultural misunderstanding regarding black drapes.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and the Misunderstanding of Black Drapes

sub_scenes.title: Reunion, Reward, and Refusal
sub_scenes.description: Reunion with the father, reward offer, and the man's refusal, gifting the magic knife.

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure Keeper and the Tale of Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new narrative about treasure, betrayal, and revenge, told by a treasure keeper.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Keeper's Prologue
sub_scenes.description: A treasure keeper begins narrating a tale of treasure and betrayal.

sub_scenes.title: Life in Penal Colony
sub_scenes.description: Setting shifts to a British penal colony, introducing prisoners and officers.

sub_scenes.title: Prisoner's Bargain
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner offers Captain Brooking a deal for treasure in exchange for escape.

sub_scenes.title: News of Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Jordan learns of Captain Brooking's betrayal and theft of the treasure.

sub_scenes.title: Inquiry and Imprisonment
sub_scenes.description: Jordan's outburst about Brooking leads to his solitary confinement.

sub_scenes.title: Years of Imprisonment and Release
sub_scenes.description: Years pass, and Jordan is released from prison.

sub_scenes.title: Vow of Revenge
sub_scenes.description: Aboard a ship, Jordan vows revenge against Captain Brooking.

Major_Arcs.title: Jordan's Revenge and the Moral of Treasure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Joseph Jordan's pursuit and confrontation with Captain Brooking, culminating in revenge and a moral conclusion about treasure.

sub_scenes.title: Jordan's Vigil
sub_scenes.description: Jordan waits for Brooking, determined to get revenge.

sub_scenes.title: Theatre Plans
sub_scenes.description: Brooking makes casual theatre plans, unaware of Jordan's presence.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation at Brooking's Home
sub_scenes.description: Jordan confronts Brooking, leading to a meeting at Brooking's house.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Resolution at Brooking's Home

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Attic and Treasure Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Brooking leads Jordan to the attic to reveal the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Fight Initiation
sub_scenes.description: Jordan reveals his intent to kill Brooking, and a fight ensues.

sub_scenes.title: Fight Resolution and Death
sub_scenes.description: Jordan shoots and kills Brooking, resolving the fight.

sub_scenes.title: Police Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Police react to the gunshot and begin investigating.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Investigate Shot and Discover Body

sub_scenes.title: Escape Attempt and Homicide Squad
sub_scenes.description: Jordan attempts to escape, and police decide to call the homicide squad.

sub_scenes.title: Moral Conclusion on Treasure
sub_scenes.description: An old man delivers a moral message about the corrupting nature of treasure.

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Dr. Styx and the mystery of the haunted Matthews Estate, setting up a supernatural investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Dr. Styx's Ominous Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Dr. Styx in an ominous scene, hinting at supernatural involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Vincent Matthews's Condemnation
sub_scenes.description: Vincent Matthews is sentenced to death for murder in a courtroom scene.

sub_scenes.title: The White Elephant Estate
sub_scenes.description: Henry Northrup and Dr. Styx discuss the unsellable and haunted Matthews Estate.

sub_scenes.title: Supernatural Expertise
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Styx reveals his expertise in supernatural matters and offers to investigate.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Haunted Estate and Warning
sub_scenes.description: Northrup arrives at the Matthews Estate and receives warnings of danger.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews
sub_scenes.description: Northrup enters the house and confronts the ghost of Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Northrup's Hatred
sub_scenes.description: Northrup reveals his own hatred and threatens Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Imminent Destruction
sub_scenes.description: Vincent Matthews threatens to destroy Northrup, escalating the conflict.

Major_Arcs.title: Fight with Vincent Matthews and Redemption through Forgiveness
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the physical and spiritual confrontation between Northrup and Vincent Matthews, leading to a path of redemption.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Attack and Claim of Power
sub_scenes.description: Vincent Matthews attacks Northrup, initiating a physical fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Attack and Claim of Power

sub_scenes.title: Northrup's Backstep and Matthews' Opportunity
sub_scenes.description: Northrup momentarily falters, giving Matthews an opening.

sub_scenes.title: Matthews' Grip and Northrup's Struggle
sub_scenes.description: Matthews grabs Northrup by the throat, gaining dominance.

sub_scenes.title: Northrup's Strength and Matthews' Surprise
sub_scenes.description: Northrup surprisingly breaks free, reversing the power dynamic.

sub_scenes.title: Questioning Violence and Shifting Power Dynamics
sub_scenes.description: A cloaked man questions a seated man (Vincent Matthews) about violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning Violence and Shifting Power Dynamics

sub_scenes.title: Confession of Fear and Societal Position
sub_scenes.description: Matthews confesses his lifelong fear despite his position.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Fear and Societal Position

sub_scenes.title: Solution of Forgiveness and Love
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked man proposes forgiveness and love as the solution.

narrative_arcs.title: The Solution of Forgiveness and Love

sub_scenes.title: Revelation of Rosalind and the Murder
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked man reveals Rosalind, the murdered sister, as the key to salvation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of Rosalind and the Murder

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution with Rosalind and Departure from the Haunted Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the haunted estate narrative with Vincent Matthews finding forgiveness and peace through his sister Rosalind.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Confrontation and Physical Domination
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked man forces Vincent Matthews to confront someone against his will.

sub_scenes.title: Summoning and Arrival of Rosalind
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind Matthews is summoned and appears.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation, Favor Request, and Forgiveness
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind is asked to forgive Vincent, and she declares her forgiveness.

sub_scenes.title: Demand for Brotherly Love and Release
sub_scenes.description: Rosalind requires brotherly love, which the cloaked man professes, leading to release.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Brotherly Love and Release

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Departure of Spirits
sub_scenes.description: Vincent expresses remorse, Rosalind forgives, and they depart as spirits.

sub_scenes.title: Return to Living World
sub_scenes.description: The cloaked man returns to the living world, reassuring others that the house is no longer haunted.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's First Voyage and Failure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts Henry Hudson's first voyage to find the Northwest Passage, ending in failure.

sub_scenes.title: Enigma of Henry Hudson's Fate
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Henry Hudson's story and his mysterious fate.

narrative_arcs.title: The Enigma of Henry Hudson's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Dutch East India Company's Proposition
sub_scenes.description: The Dutch East India Company proposes a voyage to Hudson to find the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Proposition

sub_scenes.title: Captain Hudson's Acceptance
sub_scenes.description: Captain Hudson accepts the proposition despite past failures.

sub_scenes.title: Rising Tensions and Turn Southward
sub_scenes.description: Tensions rise on the voyage, and the ship turns southward.

narrative_arcs.title: Rising Tensions and a Turn Southward

sub_scenes.title: Entering Hudson River with Hope
sub_scenes.description: Hope rises as they enter a river believed to be the passage.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Hudson River with Hope

sub_scenes.title: Disappointment in Hudson River
sub_scenes.description: Disappointment sets in as the river is not the passage.

sub_scenes.title: Hudson's Resignation and Decision to Return
sub_scenes.description: Hudson resigns to failure and decides to return home.

narrative_arcs.title: Hudson's Resignation and Decision to Return

sub_scenes.title: Return to Holland
sub_scenes.description: The Half Moon returns to Holland, ending the first voyage.

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Second Voyage and Mutiny
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Henry Hudson's second voyage, which ends tragically in mutiny and his abandonment.

sub_scenes.title: Another Voyage Backed by a New Company
sub_scenes.description: Hudson gets backing for a second voyage from a new company.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage Backed by a New Company

sub_scenes.title: Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
sub_scenes.description: The ship gets trapped in ice, forcing them to establish winter quarters.

narrative_arcs.title: Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters

sub_scenes.title: Ice Melts and Disagreement Over Course
sub_scenes.description: Ice melts, but disagreement arises about continuing or returning.

narrative_arcs.title: The Ice Melts and Disagreement Over Course

sub_scenes.title: The Mutiny Begins
sub_scenes.description: The crew mutinies against Captain Hudson.

sub_scenes.title: Scuffle and Ousting of Captain Hudson
sub_scenes.description: A scuffle occurs, and Hudson is ousted from the ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Scuffle and Ousting of Captain Hudson

sub_scenes.title: Captain Hudson Set Adrift and Mutineers' Departure
sub_scenes.description: Hudson and loyal crew are set adrift as the mutineers return home.

narrative_arcs.title: Captain Hudson Set Adrift and Mutineers' Departure

sub_scenes.title: Mutineers' Return and Arrest
sub_scenes.description: Mutineers return home and face arrest for their actions.

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan and the Rescue from the Tartars
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Hassan's mission to rescue a kidnapped girl from the Tartars, detailing his journey and infiltration.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase by Tartar Horsemen
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Hassan being chased by Tartar horsemen.

sub_scenes.title: Summoned by Caliph for Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is summoned by the Caliph and tasked with a rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoned by the Caliph for a Rescue Mission

sub_scenes.title: Setting off to Confront Tartars
sub_scenes.description: Hassan sets off to confront the Tartars.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars

sub_scenes.title: Oasis Discovery and Tartar Trail
sub_scenes.description: Hassan finds Tartar tracks at an oasis, confirming his path.

sub_scenes.title: Warning from a Traveler
sub_scenes.description: Hassan encounters a traveler who warns him of danger.

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Continued Mission
sub_scenes.description: Hassan bids farewell to the traveler and continues his mission.

sub_scenes.title: Reaching the Tartar Camp Outskirts
sub_scenes.description: Hassan reaches the Tartar camp outskirts at night.

sub_scenes.title: Sentry's Threat and Hassan's Attack
sub_scenes.description: Hassan ambushes a Tartar sentry.

sub_scenes.title: Disguise and Infiltration Plan
sub_scenes.description: Hassan decides to use the sentry's cloak as a disguise for infiltration.

sub_scenes.title: Inside Tartar Camp and Confirmation of Daughter
sub_scenes.description: Hassan infiltrates the camp and confirms the daughter's presence and location.

narrative_arcs.title: Inside the Tartar Camp and Confirmation of the Daughter

Major_Arcs.title: Capture and Challenge by Kurgan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Hassan's contact with the prisoner, his detection, capture, and the challenge presented by Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Contacting the Prisoner
sub_scenes.description: Hassan contacts the prisoner, who reveals herself as his aide.

sub_scenes.title: Detection and Confrontation by Tartar Soldiers
sub_scenes.description: Tartar soldiers detect Hassan, leading to confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Detection and Confrontation by Tartar Soldiers

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Order to Kurgan
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is captured and ordered to be brought to Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Kurgan's Interrogation and Challenge
sub_scenes.description: Kurgan interrogates Hassan and proposes a deadly challenge.

sub_scenes.title: Negotiation and Agreement for Combat
sub_scenes.description: Hassan and Kurgan negotiate the terms of the combat challenge.

sub_scenes.title: Hassan's Resolve and Determination
sub_scenes.description: Hassan reflects on the challenge and strengthens his resolve.

Major_Arcs.title: The Contest and Hassan's Victory
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the contest itself, showcasing Hassan's resourcefulness and combat skills, leading to his victory.

sub_scenes.title: The Signal and Start of Contest
sub_scenes.description: The contest begins with a signal in front of spectators.

narrative_arcs.title: The Signal and the Start of the Contest

sub_scenes.title: Dirt as Weapon and Initial Attack
sub_scenes.description: Hassan uses dirt as a weapon in his initial attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Dirt as a Weapon and Initial Attack

sub_scenes.title: Exploiting Advantage and Close Combat
sub_scenes.description: Hassan exploits his advantage and engages in close combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Exploiting the Advantage and Close Combat

sub_scenes.title: Sword Fight and Threat
sub_scenes.description: Hassan engages in a sword fight, issuing threats.

sub_scenes.title: Throwing and No Mercy
sub_scenes.description: Hassan throws an opponent and shows no mercy.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Negotiation with Kurgan
sub_scenes.description: After winning, Hassan negotiates with Kurgan for the promised reward.

Major_Arcs.title: Farewell and Romantic Undertones
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes Hassan's mission with farewells and hints of a developing romantic relationship.

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Clarification
sub_scenes.description: Farewell scene with Kurgan and the woman clarifying the earlier kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Questioning and Blushing
sub_scenes.description: The woman questions Hassan's feelings, leading to a blushing reaction.

sub_scenes.title: Bagdad, Departure, and a Kiss
sub_scenes.description: Near Bagdad, the woman kisses Hassan as a reward before they part ways.
